channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- Marketing Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- Marketing Platform

item.title: CVE-2016-0228|2024-08-05T22:15:23.069Z -- ibm%20corporation -- marketing%20platform
item.description: IBM Marketing Platform 10.0 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability in various scripts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites. IBM X-Force ID: 110236.

item.title: CVE-2016-0255|2024-08-05T22:15:23.190Z -- ibm%20corporation -- marketing%20platform
item.description: IBM Marketing Platform 9.1 and 10.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 110564.
